title: MOTD怎么在BungeeCord显示整个群组所有服务器在线人数
author: 恋
txt_content:
1.12版本 我在登陆服和BC端都装了MOTD 现在MOTD只显示登录服在线人数  所以在线人数一直为0 QQ截图20170723151254.jpg (2.97 KB, 下载次数: 0) 下载附件 2017-7-23 15:17 上传 如何配置让在线人数显示整个群组所有服务器的人数 MOTD的useBungeeCord选项和所有子服务器的bungeecord选项均已打开 BC端配置文件如下
ip_forward: true
network_compression_threshold: 256
stats: 0bfa93b1-c563-4613-b509-e389683bc387
groups:
md_5:
- admin
servers:
lobby:
motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
address: localhost:9258
restricted: false
SC:
motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
address: localhost:9260
restricted: false
XYX:
motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
address: localhost:2959
restricted: false
PVP:
motd: '&1Just another BungeeCord - Forced Host'
address: localhost:9261
restricted: false
timeout: 30000
player_limit: -1
listeners:
- query_port: 9258
motd: '&1Another Bungee server'
tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
query_enabled: false
proxy_protocol: false
forced_hosts:
pvp.md-5.net: pvp
ping_passthrough: true
priorities:
- lobby
bind_local_address: true
host: 0.0.0.0:9257
max_players: 888
tab_size: 60
force_default_server: true
prevent_proxy_connections: false
permissions:
default:
- bungeecord.command.server
- bungeecord.command.list
admin:
- bungeecord.command.alert
- bungeecord.command.end
- bungeecord.command.ip
- bungeecord.command.reload
online_mode: false
log_commands: false
disabled_commands:
- disabledcommandhere
connection_throttle: 4000
